firebase-toolsのインストール さっそくログインしてみるもエラー  をつけてみるも改善せず・・・。
Paste authorization code here って言われても即エラーになるから貼り付けるタイミングないんですが？？ そのものズバリなissueがありました。 https://github.com…
markdownRemark.html:
firebase-toolsのインストール

npm install -g firebase-tools

さっそくログインしてみるもエラー

$ firebase login
i  Firebase optionally collects CLI usage and error reporting information to help improve our produc
ts. Data is collected in accordance with Google's privacy policy (https://policies.google.com/privac
y) and is not used to identify you.

? Allow Firebase to collect CLI usage and error reporting information? Yes
i  To change your data collection preference at any time, run `firebase logout` and log in again.

Visit this URL on this device to log in:
https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth?client_id=563584335869-fgrhgmd47bqnekij5i8b5pr03ho849e6.ap
ps.googleusercontent.com&scope=email%20openid%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloudplatf
ormprojects.readonly%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Ffirebase%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google
apis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloud-platform&response_type=code&state=989726811&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalh
ost%3A9005

Waiting for authentication...

Error: An unexpected error has occurred.

Having trouble? Try again or contact support with contents of firebase-debug.log

--no-localhost をつけてみるも改善せず・・・。 Paste authorization code here って言われても即エラーになるから貼り付けるタイミングないんですが？？

$ firebase login --no-localhost
i  Firebase optionally collects CLI usage and error reporting information to help improve our produc
ts. Data is collected in accordance with Google's privacy policy (https://policies.google.com/privac
y) and is not used to identify you.

? Allow Firebase to collect CLI usage and error reporting information? Yes
i  To change your data collection preference at any time, run `firebase logout` and log in again.

Visit this URL on any device to log in:
https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth?client_id=563584335869-fgrhgmd47bqnekij5i8b5pr03ho849e6.ap
ps.googleusercontent.com&scope=email%20openid%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloudplatf
ormprojects.readonly%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Ffirebase%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google
apis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloud-platform&response_type=code&state=492599012&redirect_uri=urn%3Aietf%3Awg%3Ao
auth%3A2.0%3Aoob

? Paste authorization code here:
Error: An unexpected error has occurred.

Having trouble? Try again or contact support with contents of firebase-debug.log

そのものズバリなissueがありました。

https://github.com/firebase/firebase-tools/issues/896

ログイン成功

$ firebase login
i  Firebase optionally collects CLI usage and error reporting information to help improve our produc
ts. Data is collected in accordance with Google's privacy policy (https://policies.google.com/privac
y) and is not used to identify you.

? Allow Firebase to collect CLI usage and error reporting information? Yes
i  To change your data collection preference at any time, run `firebase logout` and log in again.

Visit this URL on this device to log in:
https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth?client_id=563584335869-fgrhgmd47bqnekij5i8b5pr03ho849e6.ap
ps.googleusercontent.com&scope=email%20openid%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloudplatf
ormprojects.readonly%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Ffirebase%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google
apis.com%2Fauth%2Fcloud-platform&response_type=code&state=813215240&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalh
ost%3A9005

Waiting for authentication...

+  Success! Logged in as paleapricot.asakuchi@gmail.com

frontmatter.title: firebase-tools loginコマンドでエラー
webpack チュートリアルをやった その2
